bug.author: Domi47
bug.description: Settings example in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/AirSim/blob/master/docs/settings.md>https://github.com/Microsoft/AirSim/blob/master/docs/settings.md</denchmark-link> shows "ClockSpeed": "1", but this produces an error. Value must be a number not a string, so it should be: "ClockSpeed": 1

comments.comment: Thanks for pointing this out. This is now fixed.
